Gift.Details: Buy this unique toy in the shape of Banana Boy that sings and will surely bring a smile on anyone's face.

Gift.Name: Apple Musical Doll
Gift.Details: This new fashion doll is soft and safe for your loved one. It has a Sensitive detector inside of it, once you touch it, it will be singing and talking with different music or sentences an apt gift for your younger ones.
